name: Assimilation (itch) (LordTommy33, Personal_Builder)
description:
Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Attack
  • Mouse Wheel - Trait Scrolling
  • Right Click - Use Active Trait

GREETINGS SUPPLICANT

EAT THE HEART OF GOD

TAKE THE TRAITS OF YOUR ENEMIES

GAIN THEIR STRENGTHS AND WEAKNESSES

REACH HEAVEN THROUGH VIOLENCE

DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING

YOU ARE ONE OF MANY, SUPPLICANT

FAIL, AND YOUR TRAITS WILL BE TAKEN

ALL ARE PART OF THE SAME SYSTEM

ACHIEVE ENLIGHTENMENT

WALK THE RUINS OF A FAILED ORDER

LEARN OF THEIR DOWNFALL

RISE ABOVE THEIR WEAKNESSES

Developers

Kevin Westerbaan

Ludvig Lindblad

Tommy Wilkinson

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Music made by ROZKOL under the CC by 4.0 licence

Machine Machochist by (Edited)

I Can Make The Pieces Fit (Edited)

Ishikawa Ambience (Edited)

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Submitted to the GameDev.tv 2022 GameJam

https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

Theme: Death is only the beginning
